name: RR6E Zine #0: The Corvine Conservatory
description:
This is a FREE zine for Ruby Radiance 6e. 

It expands on the setting of the Roaring Valley, with a location/organisation which exemplifies the values and tone of the Roar. 

Inside you will find adventure seeds inside the campus of the Corvine Conservatory, notes on its structure and organisation, two NPCs, a new class and discussion of magic in society and its mode of production.

Please leave any feedback you think forthcoming. This is a trial run for what the future of Ruby Radiance and/or the Roaring Valley may become.
